participant_1.background:
My Impala is the only thing I have to show for my life.
i am a musician.
I love taking care of my curls.
I'm sad because my best friend just moved away.
I went to Japan and spent my days trying new foods and exploring the city.

participant_2.background:
I would brag about my ability to find peace and tranquility in nature.
i am a kindergarten teacher.
i have a lot of trophies from my childhood.
I am not sure if my co-worker likes me, but I have a dog named Max.
i love to eat meat.

content.text: Hey there! Not much, just enjoying my day off.
Nice! I'm trying to make the most of mine too. How are you liking your job as a kindergarten teacher?
It's great! I love working with kids and helping them learn.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to be a teacher, but I'm not sure if I'm brave enough to do it.
It's definitely not easy, but it's so rewarding.
I'm sure it is. I'm a musician, but I've been thinking about getting into teaching.
That would be cool! I love music. I used to play the flute in high school.
That's awesome! I play the guitar and the piano.
Nice! I've always wanted to learn how to play the piano.
It's not too hard, but it takes a lot of practice.
I'm sure I could do it. I'm pretty good at picking up new things.
I'm sure you could! You should give it a try.
I will! Thanks for the encouragement.
